EmailTemplate.name: Case Emails For Non-Members -DE-EN
EmailTemplate.subject: We'll be in touch (ID: {!Case.Thread_Id})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
We've received your enquiry ID: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
While you wait for our Customer Support team to get back to you we would kindly invite you to visit our help pages at https://my.dazn.com/help/DE-en where you can find information and solutions to the most common problems.
If you were able to resolve your issue it would be great if you reply to this email with a quick “I no longer need help” and we will close your enquiry without contacting you.
Otherwise our Customer Support team will get in touch within 72 hours.
Best regards, Your DAZN Team
Case Thread ID: {!Case.Thread_Id} Privacy Policy: https://my.dazn.com/help/de-en/privacy Terms of Use: https://my.dazn.com/help/de-en/terms
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
